script.title: Google Analytics Timeline
script.description: Download Google Analytics settings to a BigQuery table.
pitches: Store, visualize, and compare Google Analytics settings over time.
instructions: Enter the dateset to which the Google Analytics settings will be downloaded.
Add the starthinker service account email to the Google Analytics account(s) in which you are interested.
Schedule the recipe to run once a day.

ga_settings_download.description: Will create tables with format ga_* to hold each endpoint via a call to the API list function.

field.name: dataset
field.description: Dataset to be written to in BigQuery.
